text: Bernard "Buzzy" Hellring was a creator of Ultimate Frisbee. Along with Joel Silver, Hellring created ultimate in the parking lot of Columbia High School in Maplewood, New Jersey. Hellring died in 1971, in an auto accident at Princeton University, New Jersey. He was elected after he died into the Ultimate Hall of Fame. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:1971 deaths Category:American inventors Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:Road accident deaths in New Jersey
title: Bernard Hellring
